user_input: 室外晚上露營的時候，拍手工製作的 pizza

output.note: Uses Positive Film to make the reds and yellows of the pizza look rich and appetizing. HDF is ON to create a creamy glow on the melted cheese and interact with the campfire/lantern light. Highlights are pulled down (-3) to prevent the fire or oil reflections from blowing out, while shading (-2) adds a cinematic vignette to focus on the food.
